name: stubooks
description:
Full-stack app that cuts out the middleman and allows students to sell textbooks directly to each other.
Backend deployed on Heroku. Frontend deployed on Netlify. Here: https://stubooks.netlify.app/
Technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, Material UI, MongoDB, Express, Node.js

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Billy N. Lewis
